library(leaflet)

  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addAwesomeMarkers(
    lat = c(39.3299, 58.0123, 55.7472, 38.9308, 27.7954),
    lng = c(-76.6204, 56.2427, 37.5358, -77.0327, -80.4801),

    icon = icons
  )
my_map
